summary:
I am a proposition developer at heart. I love creating new propositions and business models and then scaling them up. I am passionate about making great impact through innovation and doing things differently. I have done so in many industries (finance, mobility, QHSE, e-commerce, sustainability). My trade is to create customer value by doing new things or doing things differently. I have done so within complex environments (corporates), mid-size companies and small companies as well as my own startups. I am well capable of working in small teams and startups. I have also led large teams of professionals and complex projects or programs. I love coaching (young) professionals in their professional and personal development. I have always been loyal, trustworthy and available to my team members, which facilitates a safe and trusting environment in which people can achieve the best results (both for the company as for themselves). I have always had an entrepreneurial mindset and I am deeply curious. This trade has led me to become an expert in many fields of marketing and business strategy. I have learned by doing as well as by attending the Amsterdam University of Applied Sciences and Tias Business School (rated top 50 worldwide). I do master all disciplines related to strategic proposition development and proposition management, this enables me to effectively deliver fitting solutions to great challenges. 
I am deeply result driven and I am capable of achieving results fast. I am experienced in creating minimum viable products that optimize results with limited investments. I have done so within my own startup as for my clients. Opposed to many concept professionals, I do love the scale-up phase as the real proof of a strategy and propositions is found in the scape-up phase.

awards.title: Webshop Award Category Entertainment
awards.description:
Categorieprijzen ABN AMRO Webshop Awards Nederland
Dit jaar vond ook de derde editie van de Webshop Awards Nederland plaats. Er worden in 23 categorieën awards uitgereikt. Dit betekent dat er drie categorieën zijn bijgekomen ten opzichte van vorig jaar. De winnaars in deze nieuwe categorieën zijn Shoeby (Baby & kind), Formido (Bouwmarkten), 123inkt.nl (Elektronica), Jac Hensen (Herenmode), vanHaren (Schoenen), Beter Bed (Slapen), bol.com (Speelgoed), Decathlon (Sport), DEEN (Supermarkten), Apple (Telecom), bol.com (Warenhuis) en fonQ (Wonen). Nieuwe categorieën en de bijbehorende winnaars zijn: 123inkt.nl (Kantoorartikelen), Warmteservice (Keukens & badkamers), bol.com (Leeswaren), Hans Anders (Optiek), Bever (Outdoor) en Welkoop (Tuin).

projects.title: Image and Branding Project - Safetychanger.com
projects.description: The project to put the safetychanger.com brand into the market. Safety Changer offers great mobile first applications for operational risk and safety management. In this project the desired corporate identity and image were designed to fit the company's mission and DNA best way possible. The project included the creation of the full corporate identity from logo to styleguide, from website to business cards.

profile_positions.description:
Jens wil zorgen voor een betrouwbaar en geloofwaardig alternatief, dat onze economie minder afhankelijk maakt van de grootbanken. Een alternatief dat je in staat stelt om je hypotheek wél rond te krijgen, ook al ben je ondernemer of starter op de woningmarkt. Een alternatief dat lener en financier een betere rente biedt door de winst van de bank met elkaar te delen.

Wij willen mensen het vertrouwen geven dat ze financiële zaken ook zonder de bank kunnen regelen. Jens bewijst dit met een makkelijke, professionele manier om een vrienden- en familiehypotheek te regelen.

Dat spreekt veel mensen aan. Jens zorgt dat dat ook kan, door laagdrempelig toegang te geven tot de kennis die nodig is om dit zelfstandig te doen. Jens biedt de zekerheid dat onderlinge hypotheken professioneel worden georganiseerd. En Jens maakt dit betaalbaar voor iedereen.
profile_positions.title: Co-Founder
Head of Product Corporate Startup a.i.

profile_positions.description: Advice to execution on digital (product) development and online marketing in the capacity of senior professional or leader.
profile_positions.title: Freelance Digital & Business Strategist

profile_positions.description: I am responsible for the business unit electric mobility. This includes EV charging, charging poles. I do contribute to the strategic decision making for the company. I am leading a team of professionals and together we shape solutions that will help entrepreneurs in making the transition to electric mobility sooner and more easy. My main focus within the team is (radical) improvement or diversification of product and services and the creation of new propositions.
profile_positions.title: Business Unit Manager Electric Mobility a.i.

profile_positions.description: My client is passionate about making an impact in the energy transition. The background of the company is facilitating fuel transactions. Their brand is much loved though. Together with a team of professionals I have studied opportunities in the broader market for sustainable transportation, brand stretch and repositioning of the company. Thereafter I have created and lead concept development which resulted in a roadmap of new products and services to match vision and viable propositions. Within my assignment I have developed the first proposition head to toe. The end result was the launch of a charging pole subscription model in february of 2020.
profile_positions.title: Proposition Development Lead

profile_positions.description: My client used to focus on online selling only. I have lead the efforts to open new (sales) channels. We did so by applying hypothesis based learning, set up an experiment and understand the opportunity before investing in it. These efforts have lead to the inception of a sales team that now runs itself.
profile_positions.title: Commercial Team Lead

profile_positions.description: My first position with MKB Brandstof was a reset of the online marketing activities. After years of continuous business it was time for fundamental renewal of strategies. This included the creation of a new enlisting process and form, analysing and bettering online marketing channels (SEA SEO affiliate) and a shift to data driven decision making.
profile_positions.title: Online Marketing Manager

profile_positions.description:
Golfmagazijn.nl is an online webshop that supplies all golf hardware needed in the golf sport. The company focusses on The Netherlands and Belgium. The company was founded in 2009 and has been groing strongly ever since. 
With excellent service and site content, a broad array of premium products and fair pricing Golfmagazijn sets a new standard in the Dutch golf industry.
profile_positions.title: Co owner

profile_positions.description: With bol.com I lead the team that manages one of the bol.com stores. My team consisted of 8-12 product managers. On a daily business I coached my team practically and I invested much in personal development and growth of my team.
profile_positions.title: Managing Senior Product Manager

profile_positions.description: With Safety Changer I served as a member of the Management Team. On a daily basis I lead the business product development together with my team of experts (product managers, user experience- graphical designers). Safety Changer uses the principles of Scrum to develop its applications effectively. In my role as Manager Marketing I was responsible for strategic marketing management. This concerned the positioning, segmentation and value propositions of the company. I was also involved in practical marketing to further improve the position of Safety Changer and its reputation.
profile_positions.title: Manager Marketing and Product Management

profile_positions.description:
As Senior Product Manager Digital I was responsible for the online matters of Nationale-Nederlanden Corporate Clients. My main focus was aimed at the primary online activity: The online portals. I did initiate the rebuilt of the portal for employees and took it from business case to implementation. Nationale-Nederlanden became leading in online employee communications. During my time as Senior Product Manager Digital I was responsible for the product backlog (within scrum) and I was system owner. I intensively worked with my stakeholders and project team to strive for the most optimal result. I have co-lead the development of a strategically important iOS/Android app. Within this project my main focus was the control of our partners and leading concept and design. 
In my role as Senior Product Manager Digital I managed one FTE and functionally lead 10 FTE directly working for the portal formula.
profile_positions.title: Senior Digital Product Manager

profile_positions.description: I did start my career in digital at Nationale-Nederlanden as Product Manager Digital with the central marketing department. Apart from some extra responsibilities as Senior the function description can be found above, see ‘Senior Product Manager Digital’.
profile_positions.title: Digital Product Manager

profile_positions.description: I gave custom fit financial solutions for individuals and business owners. Best description is that of financial planner. Besides that I was a coach and trainer for new personel.
profile_positions.title: Financial Planner

profile_positions.description: I gave advise to the clients of the bank regarding mortgages, loans, stock and savings accounts.
